name: Lost Witch
description:
You just woke up from a long slumber. In front of you is a strangely dressed girl.

----

This is a short ~1000 words story written for O2A2 (Again) in July 2021.

While there is no graphical depiction of violence, it does mention killing and murder, and may contains mind alteration spells and a transformation spell. (Well it does contain these)

It is the first game project I finished in a looong time, and I was never confident in my writing. Especially in english, as a pretty much non-english speaker.

I still hope you like the story. (^w^)

YHK

----

Mac version is untested, as I lack a Mac to test it. So it's pretty much just what the RenPy builder gave me.
